replies.msg:
有冇人識得整playlist?
我明明開咗個playlist但係唔識自己轉wallpaper，點搞？

#!/bin/bash
# linux mint auto change wallpaper

DELAY=600
DIRECTORY=/png-directory

for f in *.png; do
gsettings set org.mate.background picture-filename "${DIRECTORY}/${f}"
sleep $DELAY
done

#!/bin/bash
# linux mint auto change wallpaper

DELAY=600
DIRECTORY=/png-directory

for f in *.png; do
gsettings set org.mate.background picture-filename "${DIRECTORY}/${f}"
sleep $DELAY
done

睇唔明

#!/bin/bash
# linux mint auto change wallpaper

DELAY=600
DIRECTORY=/png-directory

for f in *.png; do
gsettings set org.mate.background picture-filename "${DIRECTORY}/${f}"
sleep $DELAY
done

btw, for loop loop 哂d 相又要重新run 個script?
